appliedUpdates.description: Added note to architecture.md that CLI register() auto-invokes builder.build(), so builder method ordering (e.g., .destructive() before/after .action()) is resolved at build time.

rejectedObservations.observation: services.yaml advertises `check: bun run check` which is a known crashing command per AGENTS.md
rejectedObservations.reason: services.yaml documents available project commands as-is. The crash is a pre-existing oxfmt bug documented in AGENTS.md Known Pre-Existing Issues. Removing the command from services.yaml would hide its existence; the workaround guidance already lives in AGENTS.md where it belongs.

rejectedObservations.observation: Architecture notes do not document dry-run transport in runHandler (whether dry-run state travels via runHandler options vs HandlerContext)
rejectedObservations.reason: The dry-run mechanism is an internal implementation detail of envelope.ts. The architecture.md already documents the user-facing contract (.destructive(true) auto-adds --dry-run, dry-run path produces preview + CLIHint). Transport-level plumbing details are better discovered from source than documented in shared architecture notes.
